聅字的基本解释

聅
chè
古代军法用箭穿耳朵的刑罚。

聅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chè］
［《廣韻》丑列切，入薛，徹。］
［《廣韻》徒干切，平寒，定。］
古代军法以矢贯耳的刑罚。

聅字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耳字部】　聅； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页966第23
【唐韻】恥列切【集韻】【韻會】敕列切，?音屮。【說文】軍法以矢貫耳也。从耳从矢。司馬法曰：小罪聅，中罪刖，大罪剄。又【廣韻】徒干切【集韻】唐干切【正韻】唐闌切，?音壇。又【集韻】羊列切。音拽。義?同。

聅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
聅字的起名意思

暂无。

灅
Basic explanation of words
灅
chè
The ancient military law used an arrow to pierce the ear.
灅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chè］
["Guangyun" ugly column cut, into Xue, tore. ]
["Guangyun" is only dry cut, calm and fixed. ]
The ancient military law used penalties to pierce the ears.
灅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Ear Word Department] 　聅; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 966 23
[Tang Yun] Shame row cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme meeting] Chinese row cut,? Yin 屮. [Said the text] The military method is also pervaded by the arrow. From the ear to the arrow. Sima Fa said: Small crimes, middle crimes, big crimes. And [Guang Yun] Tu Ganqie [Jiyun] Tang Ganqie [Zheng Yun] Tang Lanqie, the music world. Also 【Jiyun】Sheep cut. Sound drag. Righteous? Same.
